item.description:
Meet at Harbor Side at 1:00.
Harborside Bar & Grille
946 Ferry Blvd
Stratford, CT. 06614

203-375-3037

http://www.harborside...

www.harborsidebargrill.com/


http://www.newengland...

www.newenglandsite.com/ct-stratfordharborside.shtml



Leave for Stratford Day Activities after a cup of coffee or a
Quick Brunch.


http://www.stratfordd...

www.stratfordday.com/index.htm


This annual town-wide event will be held on Main Street from
Church St. to Stratford Ave.
Main Street and Broad Street between Main and I-95
will be closed to thru traffic from approximately 7:00 am to 8:00 pm.
Free, convenient parking is at Deluca Field, on Main Street,
just south of Stratford Day.
A free shuttle bus runs from Deluca Field to Main Street and
Stratford Avenue, the southern border of Stratford Day.

What to Do?

Stratford Day is an event where you can have fun, meet
your friends, enjoy free entertainment,
get some great food, check out some cool cars and motorcycles,
play some games, people watch and just stroll around.
We strive to have something of interest and value for every age.
Stratford Day is an opportunity to bring together our townspeople
and visitors from other towns for fun, entertainment and information.
It's a way for our town organizations to publicize their missions.
Some offer food and games to the public as fundraisers.
We have a variety of crafters with unique items for sale.

Directions;

A free shuttle bus runs from Deluca Field to Main Street & Stratford
Avenue, the southern border of Stratford Day.

I-95 Northbound
North to Exit 31 - bottom of ramp, STRAIGHT through light.
Follow along interstate through two stop signs,
one right after the other. Turn RIGHT onto SOUTH AVE.
(at Camelot Motel and ramp back onto I-95).
Next light turn RIGHT onto MAIN ST. Follow through two more lights,
DELUCA FIELD is on your left.

I-95 Southbound
South to Exit 31 - bottom of ramp, LEFT onto SOUTH AVE.
Next light turn RIGHT onto MAIN ST. Follow through two more lights,
DELUCA FIELD is on your left.

Route 8/25 Southbound
Take the Route 8/25 connector South to I-95.
Follow directions for I-95 Northbound.

Merritt Parkway Northbound
Exit 49 for Route 25 Southbound. Follow South to I-95.
Follow directions for I-95 Northbound.

Merritt Parkway Southbound
Easy Directions. A simple route to follow but a few miles out of
your way. Take Merritt south all the way to Exit 49 for
ROUTE 25 South. Follow directions for Merritt Parkway
Northbound.

Harder Directions. Exit 53 for ROUTE 110 SOUTH.
Bottom of ramp at light turn LEFT. Follow RT. 110 SOUTH, MAIN ST.
through two quick lights and turn LEFT at third light
(1.9 miles, Mill River Country Club) to FOLLOW RT. 110 SOUTH.
Straight through next two lights, under RR bridge and bear right
at third light. Immediately get into the left lane.
Follow straight through next light. Just past this light do
NOT merge onto I-95 ramp. Instead bear left under the expressway,
but then immediate right. STRAIGHT through light onto
FERRY BLVD. Two more lights, LEFT onto ELM ST.
Follow Elm St. to end, at light, LEFT onto MAIN ST. DELUCA FIELD
is a short ways down on your left.

Deluca Field is right next to the Old Textron/
Lycoming Factory. Most who live in Stratford know where
That location is on the far end of Main Street.
Remember that most of Main Street will be closed off
Due to Stratford Day. I am planning on taking I 95, using
The above directions to get to Deluca Field.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Wait outside the restaurant door for around 15 minutes for members.
item.why: Stratford Day has activities for all ages all day.
item.name: Coffee Talk Sips Coffee the Day in Stratford
